overview: Eric is vice president of marketing, communications and product management operations for Prodiance. Eric has been with Prodiance since the inception, and has had a direct impact on creating the Prodiance brand, launching the company’s spin-off from parent company Scientific Software, developing strategic partnerships, and enabling expansion into new markets. Prior to joining Prodiance, Eric was vice president of marketing for Enterprise Content Management at Scientific Software, and has held senior management and executive positions in marketing and product management with EMC, Documentum, Vignette Corporation, OnDisplay and the General Electric Company. Eric is a veteran of the US Air Force, and holds a Bachelor of Science degree in mechanical engineering from Santa Clara University.
